mnd7:19.3: bhaggakaṇḍakoti → bhaggakaṇṭakoti (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj), manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd7:31.3: nānābhisaṅkhāre → nānābhisaṅkhārehi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), ajjhosannā → ajjhopannā (bj, sya-all) | ajjhosānā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd7:60.1: tāmaliṃ → kamaliṃ (sya-all) | tamaliṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | taṃmaliṃ (mr), tambapāṇiṃ → tambapaṇṇiṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed ^mnd15#58 [Attadaṇḍasuttaniddesa]), paramayonaṃ → pinaṃ (sya-all), gacchati, vinakaṃ → allasandaṃ gacchati navakaṃ (bj) | allasandaṃ gacchati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), gacchati, mūlapadaṃ gacchati →  etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu
mnd7:82.4: ānaṇyaṃ → āṇaṇyaṃ (aṭṭha.), kantāraddhānapakkhandā → kantāraddhānapakkhantā (bj) | kantāraddhānaṃ pakkhannā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
